name: tamaGOtoki
description:
Fast-paced Tamagotchi simulation game!

Feed, clean and play with your pet... very quickly! Keep it alive as long as possible. It loves big burgers (try to alternate steak and vegetable!) and do headers with its balloon :)

Play it in your browser >> http://mysterarts.com/gotoki/

Use the 3 arrow keys (or click on the buttons with your mouse, but it's less effictive...). Works also on your mobile, to relive the true feeling of the Tamagotchi. (Could also be perfect in an arcade cabinet with 3 big buttons ala Pop'n Music ^^)

If you can't bear my incredible SFXs, press "M" to mute.

Made by Mysterarts in 1 week for Oujevipo Contest #2 : KIDS
